resume_text:
Abdul Kalam Pulicharla

Dekalb, IL | Phone: 779-902-0664 | Email ID: abdulkalampulicharla@gmail.com | Portfolio: http://theabdulkalam.com



PROFESSIONAL SUMMERY

Developed AI-driven solutions for forecasting, medical diagnostics, and spam detection using LSTM, CNNs, and Naive Bayes. 

Built and deployed deep learning models (ResNet, VGG16, EfficientNet) with Grad-CAM and Power BI for explainable healthcare AI.

Designed time series models that reduced inventory costs by 25% and increased revenue by 12% using advanced feature engineering.

Integrated ML models into full-stack apps using Flask, React.js, and PostgreSQL, with real-time deployment on Render.

Expert in Python, SQL, data preprocessing, and machine learning pipelines, with experience in handling missing data, outlier detection, feature selection, and real-time deployment using Flask.



TECHNICAL SKILLS

Programming Languages & Databases: Python, Java, SQL

Tools & Libraries: Machine Learning (Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, TensorFlow, Keras), GitHub, Windows, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Power BI

Web Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Flask, Node.js, Bootstrap



PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Data scientist, KNNX 											 Feb 2023-Aug 2023

Architected and deployed an LSTM-based time series forecasting model for granular SKU-level demand prediction in an e-commerce pipeline, driving a 25% reduction in inventory costs and a 12% uplift in revenue by engineering features such as lag variables, rolling means, and applying MinMax scaling and log transformation techniques.

Sanitized and structured large-scale datasets by resolving missing values through KNN imputation and linear interpolation, isolating and mitigating outliers using Z-score and IQR thresholds, and eliminating duplicates, resulting in a clean, production-grade input stream for forecasting models.

Fine-tuned LSTM and XGBoost architectures via Bayesian Optimization (Hyperopt) and GridSearchCV, leading to a 12% boost in validation accuracy and improved temporal stability across multiple product categories.

Benchmarked model performance against ARIMA, Prophet, and XGBoost using evaluation metrics such as MAE, RMSE, and MAPE, and endorsed the LSTM model for deployment based on its consistent outperformance in long-range prediction accuracy.

Data Science Intern, SHIASH INFO SOLUTIONS PVT LTD						Feb 2022-Dec 2022

Engineered an end-to-end diagnostic pipeline leveraging deep learning and computer vision to interpret X-ray and CT scan imagery, enhancing clinical decision support through strategic preprocessing with CLAHE and Gaussian filtering for optimal contrast and noise reduction.

Implemented advanced CNN-based architectures including ResNet, VGG16, and EfficientNet using transfer learning, data augmentation, and early stopping with learning rate schedulers, resulting in superior detection accuracy and minimized diagnostic variability.

Validated model robustness and classification strength through metrics like F1-score, AUC-ROC, and confusion matrix, achieving measurable gains over legacy image analysis tools and boosting clinical trust.

Deployed the solution through a Flask web interface, integrating Grad-CAM visualization for transparency and clinical interpretability, and connected it with a Power BI dashboard to enable real-time radiological review and patient-level diagnostic exploration.

Analyst Intern, BSR & CO LLP									 Jan 2021-Nov 2021

Applied enterprise risk management techniques including threat modelling, access control audits, data flow analysis, and policy compliance checks, leading to a 15% boost in client compliance and streamlined business operations.

Evaluated IT systems through client walkthroughs, identifying risks and optimizing processes using ITACS and GITC controls.

Developed and delivered data-driven presentations using MS Excel and PowerPoint, providing actionable insights that strengthened decision-making for senior management and client stakeholders.

Analysed over 10,000 employee login records using Excel Pivot Tables and conditional formatting to detect irregular login patterns, password expiry risks, and access anomalies; flagged and addressed 25% of potential security issues, significantly enhancing client data security and compliance.



PROJECTS

Expense Tracker & Debt Repayment time Calculator GitHub

Designed a comprehensive financial management website for international students to track expenses, analyse income, and calculate debt repayment timelines, leveraging Python and Flask for efficient backend functionality and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for an intuitive, user-friendly interface.

Integrated a MySQL database to securely store user data and transaction history, enabling dynamic updates and personalized financial insights for effective budgeting and debt management.

Working on integrating AI based suggestions for improved user experience to manage the financial decisions.



Project Accommodation GitHub

Engineered a full-stack web platform enabling international students to register, authenticate, and access a personalized dashboard to list rental accommodations, sell furniture, and offer item giveaways—streamlining peer-to-peer housing support

Designed and integrated a PostgreSQL-backed database schema for efficient user, listing, and transaction management, ensuring data integrity, scalability, and seamless frontend-backend connectivity via Flask APIs.

Developed an intelligent NLP-based chatbot assistant using NLTK (WordNetLemmatizer, tokenization) and a custom TensorFlow neural network to automate user support and handle dynamic queries with a confidence-based intent classification system.

Pre-processed conversational data and built a multi-layered intent classifier with bag-of-words representation, ReLU activations, dropout layers, and SoftMax output, achieving high accuracy for contextual response generation.

Implemented modular and responsive frontend components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling intuitive UX for listing accommodations, browsing available resources, and interacting with the AI assistant.

Proposed and outlined a room swapping feature for future implementation—allowing users with roommate conflicts to mutually exchange rooms based on mindset compatibility, aiming to enhance user satisfaction and emotional well-being.

Spam detection web application GitHub | App

Built a spam classification model using Multinomial Naive Bayes with TF-IDF vectorization and text preprocessing in Jupyter Notebook.

Applied text preprocessing techniques including lowercasing, stopword and punctuation removal, tokenization, and lemmatization; removed duplicates and normalized labels to enhance model input quality and prediction accuracy

Developed a full-stack web app using React.js for frontend and Flask (Python) for backend, integrating the trained model for real-time predictions.

Deployed the application on render, enabling live predictions with a clean UI and functional REST API endpoints.



EDUCATION

Northern Illinois University                        								 Aug 2023-May 2025

Master of Science, Computer Science

Vel Tech Rangarajan Dr. Sagunthala R&D Institute of Science and Technology			 July 2019-July 2023

Bachelor of Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering

Page 1 of 2 
 
Jaswanth Jammula 
Mobile: 779-910-3852 | Location: Dekalb, IL | Email: jaswanthjammula1999@gmail.com 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
• 
2+ years of experience in manufacturing industry including BOM and international freight management. 
• 
Strong knowledge of ERP systems and order fulfilment processes by day-to-day monitoring using SAPERP for 
workflow visibility. 
• 
Applied transportation management system software to plan and execute physical movement of goods. 
• 
Strong understanding of KPI’s including On-time delivery, production schedule attainment, total cycle time, 
capacity utilization, throughput, yield, scrap, availability, customer return rate, and overall equipment 
effectiveness. 
• 
Proficient in lean methodologies by using technical tools such as kaizen, workplace organization and visual 
controls. 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
General Software: Power BI, Tableau, Minitab, Maximo, SAPERP, TMS, SQL, Microsoft Office. 
Six Sigma & Lean Tools: Value Stream Mapping, Pareto Chart, Regression Analysis, Control Chart, Kaizen, Poka-
Yoke, Fish Bone (Ishikawa) Analysis, Quality Function Deployment, DMAIC, 5 Whys, Root Cause Analysis, Takt 
Time, Just in Time (JIT). 
CAD: AutoCAD, Catia, Solid works. 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Gaionics 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Jan 2023 – May 2023 
Contract Procurement Analyst 
• 
Prepared various management reports using SAP data including annual report of supplier contracts. 
• 
Developed KPIs including PPV, cost savings, cash flow, and service metrics. 
• 
Increased productivity by 15% and reduction in errors by 9% using SAP modules, such as FI/CO, PP, SD and MM 
to meet company requirements. 
• 
Conducted model pricing for aquaponics machinery including media beds, floating baths and modular shelf and 
negotiating agreements that maximized benefits and decreased corporate risks by 8.3%. 
• 
Developed and submitted bid acceptance checklists, bid worksheets, bid response forms, signed contract copies, 
and cost overview to administration group for implementation. 
• 
Worked with finance and operation groups to create procurement strategies that align with company long term 
goals. 
• 
Established methods and strategies to benchmark and manage price risks. 
• 
Negotiated several long-term contracts with suppliers which generated significant profit by maintaining good 
relationship. 
 
JAI RAJ ISPAT LTD 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Nov 2020 – Dec 2021 
Supply Chain Analyst 
• 
Maintained inventory levels to meet the requirements of the company and customers through studying the flow of 
materials such as schedule, order quantity, restocking, and weekly cycle counts that reduced customers backorders 
by 75%. 
• 
Created forecast recommendations and ensured proper inventory levels with over 70,000 items. 
• 
Monitored and assisted the control of nonworking inventory. 
• 
Managed supply chain master data to drive material flow and support inventory and space objectives. 
• 
Worked with supply chain manager to lead process improvement initiatives for improving the performance of 
supply chain, including development of fleet management methods that decreased 13% of transportation costs. 
• 
Prepared, reviewed, and maintained 40+ price lists and purchase order reports. 
• 
Provided data and decision support systems and analyses to key stakeholders. 
 
RINL Vizag Steel Plant  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Apr 2020 – Sep 2020 
Logistics Coordinator Intern 
• 
Worked with logistics staff in planning and shipping of steel parts. 
• 
Created logs and reports of warehouse stocks and executed orders. 
• 
Developed and maintained strong communication with various business units, improved customer satisfaction. 
• 
Created and implemented improvements to internal logistics processes. 
• 
Performed inspection of incoming goods and receipts in SAP. 
 
Page 2 of 2 
 
South Central Railway  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Apr 2019 – Sep 2019 
Parts Advisor Intern 
• 
Provided technical support to customers and assisted with selection of appropriate parts according to their 
requirements. 
• 
Assisted in maintaining constant inventories. 
• 
Assisted with daily inventory, stocking, receiving and shipping. 
• 
Provided price quotes and order status information. 
• 
Processed retail client payments by invoice and obtained credit authorizations that all sales charged receipts are 
signed and received by client. 
 
Education 
Northern Illinois University 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Jan 2022 – May 2023 
Master of Science, Industrial and Systems Engineering 
Acharya Nagarjuna University 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Jun 2017 – Jul 2021 
Bachelor of Science, Mechanical Engineering

resume_text:
Abdul Kalam Pulicharla

Dekalb, IL | Phone: 779-902-0664 | Email ID: abdulkalampulicharla@gmail.com | Portfolio: http://theabdulkalam.com



PROFESSIONAL SUMMERY

Pioneered the design of AI systems that delivered a 25% reduction in inventory waste and saved ~$120K annually by aligning LSTM and XGBoost models with business forecasting goals across 500+ SKUs

Streamlined data workflows by building and orchestrating ETL processes with Apache Airflow and Spark, cutting data preparation time by 60%, slashed manual intervention by 80%, through techniques like imputation and feature engineering on large datasets.

Developed intelligent ML solutions, including a fraud detection pipeline (Random Forest, KNN) that improved early detection by 17%, and a resume-role matching engine (BERT, SpaCy) enhancing job recommendation relevance.

Enhanced stakeholder understanding of AI outputs by applying explainable AI (Grad-CAM) and creating Power BI dashboards, alongside implementing CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions for faster iteration and improved trust in model outcomes.

TECHNICAL SKILLS

Programming Languages & Databases: Python, Java, SQL

Tools & Libraries: Machine Learning (Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, TensorFlow, Keras), GitHub, Windows, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Power BI

Web Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Flask, React.js



PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Data scientist, KNNX 											 Feb 2023-Aug 2023

Designed and implemented an automated forecasting pipeline to predict weekly demand across 500+ SKUs using LSTM and XGBoost, leading to a 25% reduction in excess inventory and saving approximately $120K annually in warehousing and stockholding costs.

Processed and optimized over 100K rows of sales and inventory data using Apache Spark, cutting data preparation time by 60% through automated imputation (KNN, linear interpolation), outlier handling (Z-score, IQR), and feature engineering.

Built and orchestrated scalable ETL workflows in Apache Airflow to automate PostgreSQL ingestion, Spark-based preprocessing, and model retraining—reducing manual intervention by over 80% and ensuring system stability via daily performance checks.

Containerized the pipeline using Docker, making it easy to deploy the same codebase in both dev and production environments across team machines and cloud servers.

Streamlined CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to automatically test, build, and deploy updates to the Airflow DAGs [Directed Acyclic Graphs]and model code, improving team productivity and reducing update-related errors.



Data Science Intern, SHIASH INFO SOLUTIONS PVT LTD						Feb 2022-Dec 2022

Built a classification pipeline using Random Forest, Decision Tree, and KNN to detect fraudulent financial transactions, improving early fraud detection by 17%.

Cleaned and processed 200K+ transaction records, applying encoding, scaling, and missing value handling for model training.

Evaluated models using F1-score, AUC-ROC, and confusion matrix, and selected the optimal model based on a balance between accuracy and false-positive rate — essential in minimizing disruption to genuine users.

Deployed the best-performing model via a Flask REST API to enable real-time fraud scoring within the client’s payment system.

Designed Power BI dashboards to monitor flagged transactions and visualize fraud risk patterns for stakeholders.



Analyst Intern, BSR & CO LLP									 Jan 2021-Nov 2021

Applied enterprise risk management techniques including threat modelling, access control audits, data flow analysis, and policy compliance checks, leading to a 15% boost in client compliance and streamlined business operations.

Evaluated IT systems through client walkthroughs, identifying risks and optimizing processes using ITACS and GITC controls.

Developed and delivered data-driven presentations using MS Excel and PowerPoint, providing actionable insights that strengthened decision-making for senior management and client stakeholders.

Analysed over 10,000 employee login records using Excel Pivot Tables and conditional formatting to detect irregular login patterns, password expiry risks, and access anomalies; flagged and addressed 25% of potential security issues, significantly enhancing client data security and compliance.

Facilitated in-depth client walkthroughs to assess IT system architecture, access controls, and data flow processes, enabling accurate identification of operational risks and ensuring alignment with ITGC audit objectives and compliance standards.















PROJECTS

AI-Powered Job Role Recommendation System | GitHub

Architected a job recommendation system leveraging BERT-based embeddings (SentenceTransformers) to semantically align resumes with relevant job roles, enabling context-aware suggestions beyond keyword matching.

Orchestrated a modular web interface using Streamlit, featuring resume upload, prediction display with confidence scores, and keyword highlighting for transparent recommendations.

Containerized the entire workflow with Docker, ensuring reproducible environments for both local development and production deployment.

Automated build, test, and deployment processes via GitHub Actions, establishing a robust CI/CD pipeline for streamlined updates and version control.

Refined recommendation accuracy through Top N evaluation, SpaCy-driven skill extraction, and dynamic scoring logic tailored to resume content.

Enabled user logging and feedback tracking to support model retraining and MLOps integration

Project Accommodation GitHub

Engineered a full-stack web platform enabling international students to register, authenticate, and access a personalized dashboard to list rental accommodations, sell furniture, and offer item giveaways—streamlining peer-to-peer housing support

Designed and integrated a PostgreSQL-backed database schema for efficient user, listing, and transaction management, ensuring data integrity, scalability, and seamless frontend-backend connectivity via Flask APIs.

Developed an intelligent NLP-based chatbot assistant using NLTK (WordNetLemmatizer, tokenization) and a custom TensorFlow neural network to automate user support and handle dynamic queries with a confidence-based intent classification system.

Pre-processed conversational data and built a multi-layered intent classifier with bag-of-words representation, ReLU activations, dropout layers, and SoftMax output, achieving high accuracy for contextual response generation.

Implemented modular and responsive frontend components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling intuitive UX for listing accommodations, browsing available resources, and interacting with the AI assistant.

Proposed and outlined a room swapping feature for future implementation—allowing users with roommate conflicts to mutually exchange rooms based on mindset compatibility, aiming to enhance user satisfaction and emotional well-being.

Spam detection web application GitHub | App

Built a spam classification model using Multinomial Naive Bayes with TF-IDF vectorization and text preprocessing in Jupyter Notebook.

Applied text preprocessing techniques including lowercasing, stopword and punctuation removal, tokenization, and lemmatization; removed duplicates and normalized labels to enhance model input quality and prediction accuracy

Developed a full-stack web app using React.js for frontend and Flask (Python) for backend, integrating the trained model for real-time predictions.

Used Vercel to host and manage the frontend of the application with CI/CD enabled via GitHub integration, ensuring rapid updates and rollback support.



EDUCATION

Northern Illinois University                        								 Aug 2023-May 2025

Master of Science, Computer Science

Vel Tech Rangarajan Dr. Sagunthala R&D Institute of Science and Technology			 July 2019-July 2023

resume_text:
Abdul Kalam Pulicharla

Dekalb, IL | Phone: 779-902-0664 | Email ID: abdulkalampulicharla@gmail.com | Portfolio: http://theabdulkalam.com



PROFESSIONAL SUMMERY

Developed AI-driven solutions for forecasting, medical diagnostics, and spam detection using LSTM, CNNs, and Naive Bayes. 

Built and deployed deep learning models (ResNet, VGG16, EfficientNet) with Grad-CAM and Power BI for explainable healthcare AI.

Designed time series models that reduced inventory costs by 25% and increased revenue by 12% using advanced feature engineering.

Integrated ML models into full-stack apps using Flask, React.js, and PostgreSQL, with real-time deployment on Render.

Expert in Python, SQL, data preprocessing, and machine learning pipelines, with experience in handling missing data, outlier detection, feature selection, and real-time deployment using Flask.



TECHNICAL SKILLS

Programming Languages & Databases: Python, Java, SQL

Tools & Libraries: Machine Learning (Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, TensorFlow, Keras), GitHub, Windows, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Power BI

Web Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Flask, Node.js, Bootstrap



PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Data scientist, KNNX 											 Feb 2023-Aug 2023

Architected and deployed an LSTM-based time series forecasting model for granular SKU-level demand prediction in an e-commerce pipeline, driving a 25% reduction in inventory costs and a 12% uplift in revenue by engineering features such as lag variables, rolling means, and applying MinMax scaling and log transformation techniques.

Sanitized and structured large-scale datasets by resolving missing values through KNN imputation and linear interpolation, isolating and mitigating outliers using Z-score and IQR thresholds, and eliminating duplicates, resulting in a clean, production-grade input stream for forecasting models.

Fine-tuned LSTM and XGBoost architectures via Bayesian Optimization (Hyperopt) and GridSearchCV, leading to a 12% boost in validation accuracy and improved temporal stability across multiple product categories.

Benchmarked model performance against ARIMA, Prophet, and XGBoost using evaluation metrics such as MAE, RMSE, and MAPE, and endorsed the LSTM model for deployment based on its consistent outperformance in long-range prediction accuracy.

Data Science Intern, SHIASH INFO SOLUTIONS PVT LTD						Feb 2022-Dec 2022

Engineered an end-to-end diagnostic pipeline leveraging deep learning and computer vision to interpret X-ray and CT scan imagery, enhancing clinical decision support through strategic preprocessing with CLAHE and Gaussian filtering for optimal contrast and noise reduction.

Implemented advanced CNN-based architectures including ResNet, VGG16, and EfficientNet using transfer learning, data augmentation, and early stopping with learning rate schedulers, resulting in superior detection accuracy and minimized diagnostic variability.

Validated model robustness and classification strength through metrics like F1-score, AUC-ROC, and confusion matrix, achieving measurable gains over legacy image analysis tools and boosting clinical trust.

Deployed the solution through a Flask web interface, integrating Grad-CAM visualization for transparency and clinical interpretability, and connected it with a Power BI dashboard to enable real-time radiological review and patient-level diagnostic exploration.

Analyst Intern, BSR & CO LLP									 Jan 2021-Nov 2021

Applied enterprise risk management techniques including threat modelling, access control audits, data flow analysis, and policy compliance checks, leading to a 15% boost in client compliance and streamlined business operations.

Evaluated IT systems through client walkthroughs, identifying risks and optimizing processes using ITACS and GITC controls.

Developed and delivered data-driven presentations using MS Excel and PowerPoint, providing actionable insights that strengthened decision-making for senior management and client stakeholders.

Analysed over 10,000 employee login records using Excel Pivot Tables and conditional formatting to detect irregular login patterns, password expiry risks, and access anomalies; flagged and addressed 25% of potential security issues, significantly enhancing client data security and compliance.



PROJECTS

Expense Tracker & Debt Repayment time Calculator GitHub

Designed a comprehensive financial management website for international students to track expenses, analyse income, and calculate debt repayment timelines, leveraging Python and Flask for efficient backend functionality and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for an intuitive, user-friendly interface.

Integrated a MySQL database to securely store user data and transaction history, enabling dynamic updates and personalized financial insights for effective budgeting and debt management.

Working on integrating AI based suggestions for improved user experience to manage the financial decisions.



Project Accommodation GitHub

Engineered a full-stack web platform enabling international students to register, authenticate, and access a personalized dashboard to list rental accommodations, sell furniture, and offer item giveaways—streamlining peer-to-peer housing support

Designed and integrated a PostgreSQL-backed database schema for efficient user, listing, and transaction management, ensuring data integrity, scalability, and seamless frontend-backend connectivity via Flask APIs.

Developed an intelligent NLP-based chatbot assistant using NLTK (WordNetLemmatizer, tokenization) and a custom TensorFlow neural network to automate user support and handle dynamic queries with a confidence-based intent classification system.

Pre-processed conversational data and built a multi-layered intent classifier with bag-of-words representation, ReLU activations, dropout layers, and SoftMax output, achieving high accuracy for contextual response generation.

Implemented modular and responsive frontend components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling intuitive UX for listing accommodations, browsing available resources, and interacting with the AI assistant.

Proposed and outlined a room swapping feature for future implementation—allowing users with roommate conflicts to mutually exchange rooms based on mindset compatibility, aiming to enhance user satisfaction and emotional well-being.

Spam detection web application GitHub | App

Built a spam classification model using Multinomial Naive Bayes with TF-IDF vectorization and text preprocessing in Jupyter Notebook.

Applied text preprocessing techniques including lowercasing, stopword and punctuation removal, tokenization, and lemmatization; removed duplicates and normalized labels to enhance model input quality and prediction accuracy

Developed a full-stack web app using React.js for frontend and Flask (Python) for backend, integrating the trained model for real-time predictions.

Deployed the application on render, enabling live predictions with a clean UI and functional REST API endpoints.



EDUCATION

Northern Illinois University                        								 Aug 2023-May 2025

Master of Science, Computer Science

Vel Tech Rangarajan Dr. Sagunthala R&D Institute of Science and Technology			 July 2019-July 2023

Bachelor of Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering
